project.description: Perform a destroy-submit-start cycle for a given fleet unit.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FLEET_UNIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the fleet unit as it appears in ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}. Does NOT require the ".service" extension.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -z $FLEET_UNIT ] || [ $FLEET_UNIT = "" ]; then exit 1 fi
eval ${SETUPKEYS}
eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl destroy ${FLEET_UNIT} || exit 0'" sleep 2
eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl submit ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}/fleet/${FLEET_UNIT}.service'" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl start ${FLEET_UNIT}'"
